m4 macros. Add support for BDB 5.2 and 5.3.

author: rjung
msg: User APR_ADDTO instead of overwriting when
This allows to specify library specific
linker flags in the LDADD_XXX variables
One example would be "-R..." to set an rpath.
Backport of r1371811 from APR trunk plus
